ext.description: VS Code extension for the Antigravity IDE to monitor the usage of the models
commands.refresh.title: AGQ: Refresh Now
commands.reconnect.title: AGQ: Reconnect
commands.showLogs.title: AGQ: Show Debug Log
config.pinnedModels.description: Model IDs to display in the status bar. If empty, shows 'AGQ'.
config.showPromptCredits.description: Show prompt credits in the status bar.
config.useSimpleNames.description: Use simple model names in status bar (Pro, Flash, Claude, etc.)
